rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}
Unit was previously coded {AZA4311, AZA4740, AZA4808}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS4778, AZA4311, AZA4740, AZA4808}

description: Under the guidance of an allocated supervisor, students will complete a research proposal. The research proposal will be compiled on an approved topic related to the student's chosen area of specialization. Students will meet with their supervisor on a regular basis and will be required to submit bi-monthly reports on proposal related writing assignments.
